pkgmetadata.longdescription: hinsightd is a http/1.1 webserver with a focus on simple code and reliable behaviour. Notable features: reverse proxying, output caching, ssl, pipelining, cgi, output compression with deflate, graceful restart and a very customizable config file using lua.

use.flag: Enable old/slow cgi support (legacy should not be used)
Use ffcall library for better logging format support
